front.title: Applications and Media Information (AMI) Extension to the Presence Information Data Format

abstract.t: The Presence Information Data Format (PIDF) defines a basic format for representing presence information for a presentity. The Application and Media Information (AMI) format described here is an extension that adds optional elements to the Presence Information Data Format (PIDF), describing what music a presentity is listening to, what video it is watching, or what game it is playing.
